mapper.insert:
insert into station_line
station_line.cent_distance,
station_line.create_time,
station_line.direction,
station_line.end_distance,
station_line.is_delete, station_line.line_id,
station_line.operator,
station_line.sort_num,
station_line.start_distance,
station_line.station_id,
station_line.status,
station_line.update_time,
values
#{centDistance},
#{createTime},

#{isDelete}, #{lineId},

mapper.update:
update station_line
station_line.cent_distance = #{centDistance},
station_line.create_time = #{createTime},
station_line.direction = #{direction},
station_line.end_distance = #{endDistance},
station_line.is_delete = #{isDelete},
station_line.line_id = #{lineId},
station_line.operator = #{operator},
station_line.sort_num = #{sortNum},
station_line.start_distance = #{startDistance},
station_line.station_id = #{stationId},
station_line.status = #{status},
station_line.update_time = #{updateTime}
where station_line.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select station_line.cent_distance, station_line.create_time, station_line.direction, station_line.end_distance, station_line.id, station_line.is_delete, station_line.line_id, station_line.operator, station_line.sort_num, station_line.start_distance, station_line.station_id, station_line.status, station_line.update_time form station_line where station_line.id = #{id}
